quick_answer.text: 100 g of mini sweet peppers provide about 26 kcal, with high vitamin C and low calories.

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini sweet pepper?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal per average mini pepper (10-15 g), scaling from 26 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Are mini sweet peppers low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 g carbs per 100 g, with 1.7 g fiber, making net carbs about 4.3 g.

faqs.q: What nutrients are in mini sweet peppers besides calories?
faqs.a: High in vitamin C, vitamin A, and antioxidants; low in fat (0.2 g) and protein (0.9 g) per 100 g.

faqs.q: Do cooking methods change calories in mini sweet peppers?
faqs.a: Raw is lowest; roasting without oil adds minimal calories, but added fats increase them significantly.

faqs.q: How many mini sweet peppers equal 100 g?
faqs.a: Approximately 7-10 mini peppers, depending on size (each ~10-15 g).
